Quest40.name: Quest40
Quest40.desc: 100 Choco Boxes to open! Average rewards are 60 HOURS of Time Candy, over 100 gems, and a 20% chance at a Rose Cape! YOU CAN ONLY GET 3 ROSE CAPES, so maybe don't buy after you get all 3!

desc: Gives +35% EXP gain when killing monsters! Level up more, get more talent points... go harder, get better, go faster, get stronger! Also gives +5% monster respawn cuz why not lol
Gives 1 Cosmic Time Candy, which can give up to 500 HOURS of AFK time! On average, it will give 24 hrs.
